terrapeer.vui.zone
Class ZoneGeometry

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.helpers.VGeometry
      terrapeer.vui.zone.ZoneGeometry
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ZoneGeometry
extends VGeometry
implements java.io.Serializable

Encapsulates all geometric data relevant to the Zone, including: - Geometric Type - Position - Width and Height (X/Y span of plane) A zone is usually a rectangle placed on the ground level of the virtual world. Extends VGeometry for position information

Title: TerraPeer

Description: P2P 3D System

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2003

Company:

See Also:
